title: Octopode crusher
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

| octopode crusher x [![Octopode crusher.png](/images/4/44/Octopode_crusher.png)](/File:Octopode_crusher.png) |                                                                        |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                                                              | 80-144                                                                 |
| [HD](/Hit_dice "Hit dice")                                                                                  | 16                                                                     |
| [XP](/XP "XP")                                                                                              | 2243                                                                   |
| [Speed](/Movement "Movement")                                                                               | 10                                                                     |
| [AC](/Armour_class "Armour class")                                                                          | 1                                                                      |
| [EV](/Evasion "Evasion")                                                                                    | 17                                                                     |
| [MR](/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance")                                                                  | 60                                                                     |
| Attack1                                                                                                     | 35 ([tentacle slap](/Attack_type "Attack type"))                       |
| Attack2                                                                                                     | 10 ([constrict](/Attack_type "Attack type"))                           |
| [Max Chunks](/Corpse "Corpse")                                                                              | 4                                                                      |
| [Type of Meat](/Corpse "Corpse")                                                                            | [Clean](/Category:Clean_corpse "Category:Clean corpse")                |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                                                     | [rDrown](/Asphyxiation "Asphyxiation")                                 |
| [Vulnerabilities](/Vulnerability "Vulnerability")                                                           | None                                                                   |
| [Habitat](/Habitat "Habitat")                                                                               | Amphibious                                                             |
| [Intelligence](/Monster_intelligence "Monster intelligence")                                                | [Human](/Category:Human_intelligence "Category:Human intelligence")    |
| [Uses](/Item_usage "Item usage")                                                                            | [Weapons & armour](/Category:Weapons_armour "Category:Weapons armour") |
| [Holiness](/Holiness "Holiness")                                                                            | [Natural](/Category:Natural_holiness "Category:Natural holiness")      |
| [Size](/Size "Size")                                                                                        | [Medium](/Category:Medium_monsters "Category:Medium monsters")         |
| [Type](/Type "Type")                                                                                        | octopode, octopode                                                     |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| - | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | This unusually strong warrior has achieved mastery over the rocks as well as the waves. Its tentacles move with uncanny grace and seem capable of sending you hurtling through the air. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Octopode crushers** are deadlier than their common [octopode](/Octopode_\(monster\) "Octopode (monster)") brethren, both physically and magically. Along with their proficiency with [Earth Magic](/Earth_Magic "Earth Magic"), they are capable of throwing anything they are currently [constricting](/Constriction "Constriction") to a non-adjacent location for 1d64 damage (40% chance of this occurring each turn of constriction). They prefer to throw the player to a location near dangerous monsters or into open space. Octopode crushers can be found in watery portions of [the Depths](/The_Depths "The Depths") and rarely in [vaults](/Vault "Vault") occurring in [Shoals](/Shoals "Shoals").

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                    |                                                      |
| :---------- | -------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Iron Shot](/Iron_Shot "Iron Shot") (3d29)         | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags")  |
| Slot2       | [Tentacle Throw](/Tentacle_Throw "Tentacle Throw") | [Natural flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Getting thrown can change your position dramatically, possibly exposing you to unexplored areas and alerting further monsters. Furthermore, the potential 64 throw damage can leave you in a vulnerable state. You'll always be thrown somewhere that's safe to inhabit and that is currently within your [line of sight](/Line_of_sight "Line of sight"), so it's a good idea to fall back and melee a crusher from a position where most or all of the locations you can see are free of monsters and not near unexplored areas.
- If your surroundings are very dangerous, try to kill or severely wound them at range. Crushers have only modest durability, and they can only throw you while you're constricted.
- Crushers often carry [shields](/Shield "Shield"), so they'll occasionally block your targeted, ranged attacks; if you're a caster, it's much more effective to use unavoidable area attacks (eg, [Fireball](/Fireball "Fireball"), [Freezing Cloud](/Freezing_Cloud "Freezing Cloud")).

## History

Octopode crushers were removed in [0.18](/0.18 "0.18").

Prior to [0.15](/0.15 "0.15"), they had only 14 HD and knew [Throw Icicle](/Throw_Icicle "Throw Icicle") instead of Iron Shot.

Octopode crushers were added in [0.14](/0.14 "0.14").
html:
Octopode crusher

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
octopode crusher x

 

HP 80-144
HD 16
XP 2243
Speed 10
AC 1
EV 17
MR 60
Attack1 35 (tentacle slap)
Attack2 10 (constrict)


Max Chunks 4
Type of Meat Clean
Resistances rDrown
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Amphibious
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type octopode, octopode
Flags Fighter
This unusually strong warrior has achieved mastery over the rocks as well as the waves. Its tentacles move with uncanny grace and seem capable of sending you hurtling through the air.


Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Octopode crushers are deadlier than their common octopode brethren, both physically and magically. Along with their proficiency with Earth Magic, they are capable of throwing anything they are currently constricting to a non-adjacent location for 1d64 damage (40% chance of this occurring each turn of constriction). They prefer to throw the player to a location near dangerous monsters or into open space. Octopode crushers can be found in watery portions of the Depths and rarely in vaults occurring in Shoals.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Iron Shot (3d29) Wizard flag
Slot2 Tentacle Throw Natural flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Getting thrown can change your position dramatically, possibly exposing you to unexplored areas and alerting further monsters. Furthermore, the potential 64 throw damage can leave you in a vulnerable state. You'll always be thrown somewhere that's safe to inhabit and that is currently within your line of sight, so it's a good idea to fall back and melee a crusher from a position where most or all of the locations you can see are free of monsters and not near unexplored areas.
  • If your surroundings are very dangerous, try to kill or severely wound them at range. Crushers have only modest durability, and they can only throw you while you're constricted.
  • Crushers often carry shields, so they'll occasionally block your targeted, ranged attacks; if you're a caster, it's much more effective to use unavoidable area attacks (eg, Fireball, Freezing Cloud).

History

Octopode crushers were removed in 0.18.

Prior to 0.15, they had only 14 HD and knew Throw Icicle instead of Iron Shot.

Octopode crushers were added in 0.14.

==Tips & Tricks== *Getting thrown can change your position dramatically, possibly exposing you to unexplored areas and alerting further monsters. Furthermore, the potential 64 throw damage can leave you in a vulnerable state. You'll always be thrown somewhere that's safe to inhabit and that is currently within your [[line of sight]], so it's a good idea to fall back and melee a crusher from a position where most or all of the locations you can see are free of monsters and not near unexplored areas. *If your surroundings are very dangerous, try to kill or severely wound them at range. Crushers have only modest durability, and they can only throw you while you're constricted. *Crushers often carry [[shield]]s, so they'll occasionally block your targeted, ranged attacks; if you're a caster, it's much more effective to use unavoidable area attacks (eg, [[Fireball]], [[Freezing Cloud]]). ==History== Octopode crushers were removed in [[0.18]]. Prior to [[0.15]], they had only 14 HD and knew [[Throw Icicle]] instead of Iron Shot. Octopode crushers were added in [[0.14]].
